plot outline: A story of coming of age of a young 15 year old boy, Aditya, who spends his free time spying on a young woman in the opposite building with a telescope, ready to give his life for her love. The young woman is enraged, and then amused when she finds out, and decides to teach young Aditya a lesson that he will never forget in his life.
title: Ek Chhotisi Love Story
akas: Ek Chhoti Si Love Story (India, Hindi title)
